level.text: Each occupied unit shall be inspected annually by DCHA. A written notice of inspection shall be given to the tenant at least two (2) days in advance.
Tenant-caused damage discovered during this inspection shall be assessed the tenant after completion of the repairs in accordance with ยง 6503 of this chapter.

level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 33 DCR 7973, 8029 (December 26, 1986).
